question: Nazar from aggrieved family without child.
answer:
QUESTION
Dear Mufti saheb, Is it possible that if one family have everything except child, and they need child desperately, have bad nazar. All (Three) families around this family are found to be effected by those thing which that Bad nazar family don't have.i.e, peace and happiness, affect on children etc., Almost all bad incidents coincided with them. And those things which that bad family (husband wife) don't know are not affected. I came into the refuge of Allah by prayers and Dua and avioding almost all forbidden things. . What can I do to protect the other two families.
ANSWER


Share:
It does not mean that if one does not have children then he/she is affected
by nazar. Allah Taala out of his wisdom at times does not grant a couple
any children. He has clearly mentioned in the Quraan "and He renders barren
whom He wills." (verse 50, chapter 42) Hence being deprived of any bounty
does not mean that one is affected by nazar.

Similarly, trials and tribulations that afflict us from time to time are not
necessarily as a result of nazar. They come to us mainly as a redemption of
our sins and to test the strength of our perserverance.

Alhamdulillah, continue with your supplications to Allah Taala.You may also
recite the "three quls" i.e Surah Ikhlaas, Falaq and Naas, three times
every morning and evening and encourage others to do so.

and Allah Ta'ala Knows Best

Mufti Ebrahim Desai
FATWA DEPT.
